import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; //Import Images import blog1Img from '../../../assets/images/blog/b-1.png'; import blog2Img from '../../../assets/images/blog/b-2.png'; import blog3Img from '../../../assets/images/blog/b-3.png'; class Blog extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {}; } render() { return ( <> {/* =============== Blog area start =============== */}
